00020 require 'simbio_form_maker.inc.php';
00021 
00031 class simbio_form_table_AJAX extends simbio_form_maker
00032 {
00033     public $table_attr;
00034     public $table_header_attr;
00035     public $table_content_attr;
00036     public $submit_button_attr = 'name="submit" value="Save Data"';
00037     public $with_form_tag = true;
00038     public $edit_mode = false;
00039     public $record_id = false;
00040     public $record_title = 'RECORD';
00041     // back button
00042     public $back_button = true;
00043     public $delete_button = true;
00044 
00045     # CONSTRUCTOR
00046     public function __construct($str_form_name, $str_form_action, $str_form_method = 'post')
00047     {
00048         // execute parent constructor
00049         parent::__construct($str_form_name, $str_form_action, $str_form_method);
00050     }
00051 
00052 
00053     # public
00054     # print out the form table object
00055     # return : string
00056     public function printOut()
00057     {
00058         // create table object
00059         $_table = new simbio_table();
00060         // set the table attr
00061         $_table->table_attr = $this->table_attr;
00062         // initialize result buffer
00063         $_buffer = '';
00064 
00065         // check if form tag is included
00066         if ($this->with_form_tag) {
00067             $this->submit_target = 'submitExec';
00068             $_buffer .= $this->startForm()."\n";
00069         }
00070 
00071         // loop the form element
00072         $_row_num = 0;
00073         foreach ($this->elements as $row) {
00074            $_form_element = $row['element']->out();
00075            if ($_form_element_info = trim($row['info'])) {
00076                $_form_element .= '<div class="formElementInfo">'.$_form_element_info.'</div>';
00077            }
00078            // append row
00079            $_table->appendTableRow(array($row['label'], ':', $_form_element));
00080            // set the column header attr
00081            $_table->setCellAttr($_row_num+1, 0, 'width="20%" valign="top"'.$this->table_header_attr);
00082            $_table->setCellAttr($_row_num+1, 1, 'width="1%" valign="top"'.$this->table_header_attr);
00083            // set the form element column attr
00084            $_table->setCellAttr($_row_num+1, 2, 'width="79%" '.$this->table_content_attr);
00085            $_row_num++;
00086         }
00087 
00088         // link and buttons
00089         $_edit_link = '';
00090         $_delete_button = '';
00091         $_back_button = '';
00092     $_del_value = __('Delete Record');
00093     $_cancel_value = __('Cancel');
00094 
00095         // check if we are on edit form mode
00096         if ($this->edit_mode) {
00097             $_edit_link .= '<a href="#" onclick="enableForm(\''.$this->form_name.'\', event); enableForm(\'deleteForm\', event); removeBlockers();" class="editFormLink">EDIT</a>';
00098             // delete button exists if the record_id properties exists
00099             if ($this->record_id && $this->delete_button) {
00100                 // create delete button
00101                 $_delete_button = '<input type="button" value="'.$_del_value.'" class="button" onclick="confSubmit(\'deleteForm\', \'Are you sure to delete '.addslashes($this->record_title).'?\nOnce Deleted it cant be restored again\')" style="color: red; font-weight: bold;" />';
00102             }
00103             // back button
00104             if ($this->back_button) {
00105                 $_back_button = '<input type="button" class="cancelButton button" value="'.$_cancel_value.'" onclick="setContent(\'mainContent\', getPreviousAJAXurl(), \'post\')" />';
00106             }
00107         }
00108 
00109         $_buttons = '';
00110         // check if form tag is included
00111         if ($this->with_form_tag) {
00112             $_buttons = '<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="3" style="width: 100%; background-color: #dcdcdc;">'
00113                 .'<tr><td><input type="submit" '.$this->submit_button_attr.' /> '.$_back_button.' '.$_delete_button.'</td><td align="right">'.$_edit_link.'</td>'
00114                 .'</tr></table>'."\n";
00115         }
00116         // get the table result
00117         $_buffer .= $_buttons;
00118         $_buffer .= $_table->printTable();
00119         $_buffer .= $_buttons;
00120 
00121         // extract all hidden elements here
00122         foreach ($this->hidden_elements as $_hidden) {
00123             $_buffer .= $_hidden->out();
00124         }
00125         // update ID hidden elements
00126         if ($this->edit_mode AND $this->record_id) {
00127             // add hidden form element flag for detail editing purpose
00128             $_buffer .= '<input type="hidden" name="updateRecordID" value="'.$this->record_id.'" />';
00129         }
00130 
00131         // check if form tag is included
00132         if ($this->with_form_tag) {
00133             $_buffer .= $this->endForm()."\n";
00134         }
00135 
00136         if ($this->edit_mode) {
00137             // hidden form for deleting records
00138             $_buffer .= '<form action="'.preg_replace('/\?.+/i', '', $this->form_action).'" id="deleteForm" target="submitExec" method="post" style="display: inline;">'
00139                 .'<input type="hidden" name="itemID" value="'.$this->record_id.'" /><input type="hidden" name="itemAction" value="true" /></form>';
00140             // disabling form
00141             $_buffer .= '<script type="text/javascript">disableForm(\''.$this->form_name.'\');disableForm(\'deleteForm\');$$(\'.cancelButton\').each( function(cb) { cb.enable(); } );</script>';
00142         }
00143         // for debugging purpose only
00144         // $_buffer .= '<iframe name="submitExec" style="visibility: visible; width: 100%; height: 200px;"></iframe>';
00145         // hidden iframe for form executing
00146         $_buffer .= '<iframe name="submitExec" style="visibility: hidden; width: 100%; height: 0;"></iframe>';
00147 
00148         return $_buffer;
00149     }
00150 }
